segments <- summaryBy(Convenient + Cool + Reliable ~ Segment, data=boats)
names(segments)[names(segments) == 'Convenient.mean'] <- 'Convenient'
names(segments)[names(segments) == 'Cool.mean'] <- 'Cool'
names(segments)[names(segments) == 'Reliable.mean'] <- 'Reliable'
for (row in 1:nrow(segments)) {
  segments[row,'Group'] <- paste('S',segments[row,'Segment'],sep=\.\")
